pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Acheron## AboutAcheron is a plotting application and data recorder for USB and TCP devices communicating via the Asphodel protocol.The Asphodel communication protocol was developed by Suprock Technologies (http://www.suprocktech.com)## LicenseAcheron is licensed under the ISC license.The ISC license is a streamlined version of the BSD license, and permits usage in both open source and propretary projects.
